stole-hearts-israel.english: So Absalom stole the hearts of the men of Israel.

wished-judge-land.context: Absalom's lament to win over the people
wished-judge-land.english: Oh that I were made judge in the land!

no-man-hear-thee.hebrew: הִנֵּה בְנִי אֲשֶׁר יָצָא מִמֵּעַי מְבַקֵּשׁ אֶת־נַפְשִׁי
no-man-hear-thee.english: Behold, my son seeketh my life

hung-oak-tree.english: And Absalom met the servants of David.

my-son-absalom.english: O my son Absalom, my son, my son Absalom!
